summary: Frontend-focused software developer with hands-on experience building production-ready web applications using React, Next.js, TypeScript, Firebase, and .NET. Background in cloud-native development, UX-focused interfaces, and end-to-end feature delivery. Known for strong communication skills, cross-functional collaboration, and the ability to translate complex requirements into intuitive user experiences.

responsibilities: Delivered end-to-end frontend features for the Voculis Switchboard production web application.
Built user and call-group management functionality with full CRUD workflows and entity relationships.
Implemented secure authentication and onboarding flows using Firebase Auth (login, verification, password recovery).
Improved UX and performance through reusable components, responsive layouts, and dark/light theming.
Added internationalization (i18n) support, enabling scalable multi-language deployment.
Developed a full notification system with persistence and per-user state handling.
Integrated frontend with backend services (Firestore, Cloud Storage), including profile image management.
Increased application stability through bug fixing, refactoring, and PR-based collaboration.
Developed and maintained web applications Signe.co using RedwoodJS and TypeScript.
Worked with Signe.co and WomenforLeaders.com on WordPress and Webflow projects.
Utilized React email, Tailwind CSS, PostgreSQL, Railway, MailChimp, Git, and Asana for various development tasks.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to ensure project goals were met.

experience.role: Head of Charitable Organization/ Board Member
responsibilities: Led a team of 200+ volunteers to deliver humanitarian aid to war-affected areas.
Coordinated logistics for transporting medical supplies, food, and clothing from Sweden to Ukraine.
Developed partnerships with local and international organizations to expand overall impact.
Deliver accurate and impartial oral interpretation in accordance with Kammarkollegiet's ethical guidelines and Good Interpretation.
Facilitate clear communication between parties in sensitive and responsible contexts.
Maintain strict confidentiality and neutrality when handling personal and sensitive information.
Adapt communication style to different environments, including administrative and service-related interactions.
Promoted banking products through inbound and outbound communication channels.
Delivered exceptional customer service by resolving inquiries efficiently.
Trained and onboarded new team members to foster a collaborative work environment.
Managed all aspects of festival logistics, including accommodation for guests and participants.
Established and maintained relationships with media partners to increase visibility and reach.
Oversaw budget planning for travel, accommodation, and procurement.
Researched, wrote, and edited articles across a wide range of topics.
Conducted interviews with prominent individuals to enhance article depth and engagement.
Collaborated with the editorial team to deliver finalized content for publication.

skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js

interests: Building user-centric interfaces with React and TypeScript
Improving usability, accessibility, and overall user experience
Continuous learning in modern frontend frameworks and best practices

achievements.description: Improved user experience through reusable components, responsive layouts, and dark/light theming.
